title: ****9/1 NORTH BEACON ST/MARKET ST-BOSTON LANDING 2BED/1.5 BA & PARKING
map_address: North Beacon St near Market St
posting_body: A very spacious, and updated two-level 2 bed/1.5 bath rental apartment located on North Beacon St in the Boston Landing neighborhood of Brighton.

The unit is located in a professionally managed apartment complex that is located just steps to the MBTA and is also very close to Boston University, Commonwealth Ave, Brookline & Beacon St, Longwood Medical, Boston Landing, and Boston College!
Heat and Hot Water are included in the rent price and there is shared laundry in the building and off-street parking!
Please email Ben with any questions or to schedule a viewing of the property!
Bus: 64 N Beacon St @ Birmingham Pkwy (0.04 mi)
Bus: 70 Arsenal St opp Arlington St (0.30 mi)
Bus: 86 Market St @ Vineland St (0.34 mi)
